bibl.title: Excavations in Firan-Sinai in the Years from 2000 to 2005.
bibl.note: Results of four excavation seasons in the area of the Episcopal town Pharan (Arabic 'Firan') in South Sinai. - 1. Season March 2000. - 2. Season March 2001. - 3. Season March-April 2002. - 4. Season November 2005. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Excavations in Firan-Sinai in the Years from 2000 to 2005.

Results of four excavation seasons in the area of the Episcopal town Pharan (Arabic 'Firan') in South Sinai. - 1. Season March 2000. - 2. Season March 2001. - 3. Season March-April 2002. - 4. Season November 2005. - Avec résumé en anglais.
